name: ERP.com
overview:
ERP.com provides articles, software listings, vendor listings, webinars/webcasts and events regarding enterprise.

The site provides one of the most robust social networking tools available where practitioners and vendors can ask questions to ERP professionals and get answers, review software and hardware solutions, and network for product leads. Consultants and practitioners can post whitepapers, tips and tools, and answers to questions and get recognized by ERP targeted clients and employers for sales and job opportunities.

Based in Los Angeles, California, ERP.com was founded in early 2007 by former entrepreneurs and Fortune 500 executives from SAP, PepsiCo, InterActiveCorp (IAC), and Lucent Technologies. It is a professional community site focused on offering the most up to date and relevant information on enterprise resource planning and a forum for ERP practitioners to post content, insights and reviews, and network for ideas and information within the ERP community.
